name: OR_CASE_APPTS
description:
This is a union view of the following OR management system case appointment-related tables:


OR_CASE_APPTS_PR - contains pre-operation information.


OR_CASE_APPTS_PS - contains post-operation information.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: APPT_TYPE
columns.description: The type of appointment that needs to be scheduled for the patient before or after the surgery. This will be 1 for pre-op or 2 for post-op.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the pre-op and post-op appointment that need to be scheduled.

columns.name: UNIQUE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the appointment that has been scheduled.

columns.name: APPT_PRC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the visit type of the pre-op or post-op appointment that needs to be scheduled for the patient.

columns.name: OR_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the related surgical procedure for which the appointment needs to be scheduled.

columns.name: OR_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider with whom the appointment should be scheduled.

columns.name: DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department in which the appointment is scheduled.

columns.name: ASN
columns.description: The unique appointment serial number associated with the appointment that is scheduled.
